title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Mutual Recognition of
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Criminal Justice (Mutual Recognition of 

Decisions on Supervision Measures) Act 2020 (Commencement) Order 2021.
text_norm: 1 order may cited criminal justice (mutual recognition decision supervision measures) act 2020 (commencement) order 2021

title: (Alteration of Name of Department and Title of Minister) Order 2020 (S.I. No.
heading: 2. The 5th day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 5th day of February 2021 is appointed as the day on which the 
Criminal Justice (Mutual Recognition of Decisions on Supervision Measures) 
Act 2020 (No. 21 of 2020) shall come into operation. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

21 January, 2021. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 26th January, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [15] 3
